name: Dice of Daedalus
description:
GMTK 2022 Game Jam entry by the BoomNak team.

CONTROLS:
Use W A S D or ARROW KEYS to roll the die around, and either press the Start button or space to start the game.

LORE:
Daedalus, the ancient inventor, has been forced by the King Minos to build him another labyrinth! With the Minotaur dead, this labyrinth will instead be used to house anyone who dares mention the name Theseus. You, unfortunately, had named your dog  Theseus, and are arrested and thrown inside when a guard overheard you calling for him. As you come to grips with your surroundings, you notice something strange - a giant die sitting in the passage next to you, along with strange markings on the floor. Perhaps Daedalus has left a way out, if you're clever enough to solve his puzzle?

NOT WORKING?
Try the direct link here if the embedded game isn't working for you, and make sure you are on the latest Chrome or Firefox version. You can try the Windows and Linux desktop builds as well.
